rules_text:
[i][i]Rally[/i] Magic[/i] – At the beginning of your upkeep, look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of those cards into your hand and the other into your graveyard.
[i]Promote[/i] – At the beginning of your end step, if a creature dealt damage by noncombat damage died this turn, transform Miriel, Rapier Intellect.
